name: StackIt!
description:
StackIt! is a simple game in which you have to stack as many blocks as possible!

Put your patience and reflexes to the  test in this simple (but not too easy) game!

Made in 3 days, inspired by Stack.

Key Features:

  • Infinite gameplay - go as far as you can!
  • High Score System - beat your previous best score!

Controls:

  • Space - place blocks
